name: Create a QuickBooks invoice from a completed PandaDoc document
description:
Create a new QuickBooks invoice (and a customer if it doesn't already exist) from a completed PandaDoc document.

PandaDoc document has to include a Pricing table. You can schedule the scenario to run as you need but adjust the first filter ("only the most recent") accordingly. For example, if it runs once a day, only documents modified in the last 24 hours should pass the filter.
